## Source: amazon-inspector (358456d344b5a4b2a92cb9b9094bafcf797200b5a0b6549e46175fbbfff70fa4)
The package captcha-paypal was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (dff8fdeb25037d1f3b4ab7f07b1e66941c95ce6fecef691bd44a684e80ee33f8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'captcha-paypal' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
